aio_success_patterns.description: Clear hierarchical structure with headings, subheadings, and bullet points that make content scannable and easy to navigate.
examples: Competitor content uses H2/H3 headings to break down complex topics into digestible sections.
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Use structured formatting with clear headings and subheadings for AI-related topics, ensuring logical flow and readability.

aio_success_patterns.description: Concise, authoritative, and neutral tone that conveys expertise without overwhelming the reader.
examples: Competitor content avoids jargon and uses simple language while maintaining technical accuracy.
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Adopt a professional yet approachable tone, avoiding overly technical language unless necessary.

aio_success_patterns.description: Inclusion of visuals like diagrams, charts, or infographics to simplify complex concepts.
examples: Competitor content uses flowcharts to explain AI processes and decision-making frameworks.
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Integrate visuals into AI-related content to enhance understanding and engagement.

aio_success_patterns.description: Citations from reputable sources and inclusion of expert opinions to establish credibility.
examples: Competitor content references academic papers and industry leaders in AI development.
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Include references to authoritative sources and quotes from ING AI experts to build trust.

aio_success_patterns.description: Thorough answers that address all aspects of the query, leaving no gaps in information.
examples: Competitor content provides detailed explanations, examples, and links to related topics.
aio_success_patterns.ing_implementation: Ensure content fully answers user queries with examples, FAQs, and links to additional resources.
